graphql.query:
mutation CreateUser($input: UserInput!) {
  createUser(input: $input) {
    status
    message
    data {
      id
      firstName
      middleName
      lastName
      email
      phone
      title
      avatar
      backgroundImages {
        id
        index
        url
      }
      bio
      links {
        id
        index
        name
        url
        visible
      }
      active
      theme
      createdBy
      createdAt
      updatedAt
    }
  }
}

mutation UpdateUser($id: String!, $input: UserInput!) {
  updateUser(id: $id, input: $input) {
    status
    message
    data {
      id
      firstName
      middleName
      lastName
      email
      phone
      title
      avatar
      backgroundImages {
        id
        index
        url
      }
      bio
      links {
        id
        index
        name
        url
        visible
      }
      active
      theme
      createdBy
      createdAt
      updatedAt
    }
  }
}

mutation DuplicateUser($id: String!) {
  duplicateUser(id: $id) {
    status
    message
    data {
        id
      firstName
      middleName
      lastName
      email
      phone
      title
      avatar
      backgroundImages {
        id
        index
        url
      }
      bio
      links {
        id
        index
        name
        url
        visible
      }
      active
      theme
      createdBy
      createdAt
      updatedAt
    }
  }
}
